dashboard.title: My Birth Charts

dashboard.noChartsSubtitle: Create your first birth chart to get started
dashboard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this birth chart?

newChart.title: New Birth Chart
newChart.subtitle: Fill in the birth details
newChart.notesPlaceholder: Add observations, context or additional information about this chart...
newChart.invalidDate: Birth date and time are required
newChart.precisionNote: The more precise the time, the more accurate the birth chart
newChart.coordinatesNote: Coordinates are automatically filled when you select a city. For better precision, use the search or adjust manually.

chartDetail.title: Chart Details
chartDetail.generatingDesc: We are calculating planetary positions and generating astrological interpretations.
chartDetail.birthChartDesc: Complete visualization of your birth sky

bigThree.sunTooltip: The Sun represents your core identity, life purpose and vitality. It is the nucleus of your conscious personality.
bigThree.moonTooltip: The Moon represents your emotions, instinctive needs and unconscious reactions. It reveals how you feel safe and comfortable.
bigThree.ascTooltip: The Ascendant is the sign that was rising on the eastern horizon at your birth. It represents your social mask and first impression.

chartDetail.planetPositionsTooltip: Exact planetary positions calculated with Swiss Ephemeris (precision < 1 arcsecond). Includes longitude, latitude, speed and retrograde state.
chartDetail.astroHousesTooltip: The 12 houses divide the sky into sectors representing life areas. System used: {{system}}. Each house has a cusp (beginning) and a planetary ruler.
chartDetail.planetaryAspectsTooltip: Aspects are geometric angles between planets that reveal how they interact. We detect major aspects (conjunction, opposition, trine, square, sextile) and minor (quincunx, semisextile, etc.) with configurable orbs.
chartDetail.arabicPartsTooltip: Arabic Parts (or Lots) are mathematically calculated points from planetary positions. They reveal specific life themes according to Hellenistic tradition.
chartDetail.arabicPartsDesc: Sensitive points from Hellenistic astrological tradition

arabicParts.whatAreDesc: Arabic Parts (also called 'Lots' in Hellenistic tradition) are mathematically calculated points from planetary and angular positions. They function as 'virtual planets', revealing specific life themes.
arabicParts.formulaDesc: Part = Ascendant + Planet1 - Planet2 (all in degrees 0-360). Formulas differ between day charts (â˜€ï¸ Sun above horizon) and night charts (ðŸŒ™ Sun below horizon).
arabicParts.importanceDesc: The house where a Part falls and the aspects it receives from natal planets are significant. The Lot of Fortune is especially important - medieval astrologers treated it with the same importance as the Ascendant.
arabicParts.originDesc: Developed in Hellenistic astrology (Greece/Rome, 100 BC - 600 AD) and expanded by medieval Arab astrologers (700-1400 AD). There are hundreds of cataloged Parts, but the 4 presented here are the most fundamental.
arabicParts.technicalNoteDesc: Your chart is {{sect}} ({{sectDesc}}), so the formulas used follow the sect rules of Hellenistic tradition.
arabicParts.notAvailable: Arabic Parts not available for this chart.
arabicParts.willBeCalculated: Parts will be automatically calculated for charts created or updated after this feature.

errors.processError: An error occurred while processing your birth chart.

profile.deleteAccountWarning: Once deleted, your account cannot be recovered. All your data will be permanently removed after 30 days.

security.oauthDesc: Manage your connections with external providers
security.lastProviderWarning: This is your last OAuth provider. Make sure you have a password set before disconnecting.
security.reconnectInfo: You can reconnect this account later.

privacy.exportDesc: Download a copy of all your data (LGPD/GDPR)
privacy.exportInfo: You can export all your personal data at any time. The file will include your profile, birth charts, and settings.
privacy.confirmPasswordPrompt: Enter your password to confirm account deletion:
privacy.confirmDeleteDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers.

educationalBanner.title: Traditional Astrology
educationalBanner.description: Our charts are calculated using Hellenistic and Medieval astrology techniques, with astronomical precision from the Swiss Ephemeris.

validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
validation.passwordSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character

planetList.dignitiesDescription: Essential dignities show a planet's strength in a given sign, based on traditional astrology.
planetList.domicileDesc: Planet in the sign it rules (+5)
planetList.scoreInfo: Positive score indicates strong planet. Negative score indicates debilitation.
planetList.lordOfNativityTitle: Lord of the Nativity - highest essential dignity
planetList.classicalNote: Showing only the 7 classical planets of traditional astrology
planetList.interpretationsDesc: AI-generated based on traditional astrology principles (essential dignities, sect). Focus on the 7 classical planets.

houseTable.interpretationsDesc: AI-generated based on traditional astrology principles. Interpretations consider the sign on the cusp and meaning of each house.

aspectGrid.orbDesc: Distance from exact aspect. Smaller orbs indicate stronger aspects.
aspectGrid.interpretationsDesc: AI-generated based on traditional astrology principles. Interpretations consider the nature of the aspect and planets involved.

arabicParts.fortuneTooltip: The most important of the Arabic Parts. Represents the physical body, vital health and material wealth that "comes to us". In Hellenistic tradition, it's calculated from Sun, Moon and Ascendant.
arabicParts.spiritTooltip: Complementary to Part of Fortune. Represents the mind, intellect and what we "make happen" through conscious actions. It's the inverse formula of Fortune.
arabicParts.erosTooltip: Represents romantic love, erotic desire and passion. Complements Venus analysis, revealing how we experience love and attraction.
arabicParts.necessityTooltip: Represents inevitable restrictions, karma and life lessons. Indicates areas where we face necessary difficulties for our development.

lunarPhase.note: The lunar phase at birth reveals patterns about temperament, life cycle and how you process emotional experiences.

temperament.title: Temperament
temperament.note: Temperament is determined by the sum of elemental qualities (Hot, Cold, Wet, Dry) from 5 factors of the natal chart: Ascendant, Ascendant Ruler, Solar Quadrant, Lunar Phase and Lord of the Nativity, following medieval astrology tradition.

oauthCallback.tokensNotFound: OAuth authentication failed. Tokens not found.
